generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white dashed lane markings extending into the distance, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A paved sidewalk runs alongside the road, bordered by a curb, and is occupied by pedestrians.
- building: A large stone building with architectural details is prominently visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green foliage are visible along both sides of the road and in the background.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing as a bright, overcast area.
- person: Several individuals are visible on the sidewalk, including adults and children, walking or standing.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a black Mercedes SUV in the foreground and other vehicles further ahead.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a white arrow pointing straight ahead is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including the one holding the traffic sign and others along the sidewalk and road.
- traffic light: No traffic light is visible in the image.
